name: Welcome Back to Fredbear's
description:
Almost forty years after every Fredbear's Family Diner location closed down, after many incidents and lawsuits that happened throughout it's history, Fazbear Entertainment had gone bankrupt, and Fredbear's became nothing more than a childhood memory and a goldmine for showbiz enthusiasts. However, Kyler Halstrom, a huge Fredbear's fan, decided to kickstart a new attraction called "Fredbear's Horror Palace", a horror attraction attempting to recreate the terrors that happened at Fredbear's, including a live show reenacting the dreaded Bite of 83'.

The horror attraction started construction in 2021, and with help from former employees, collectors and loads of funding, Fredbear's Horror Palace became the most ambiguous project in all of Fazbear Ent. history.

Welcome back to Fredbear's Family Diner.
